overview:
Rochelle was an at-home mom for 12 years before putting those multitasking and organizational skills to use in the convention industry as a Marketing Director. She switched over to telecom and became the number one salesperson in the country for her company. Then her path came full circle and Rochelle put her sales and management skills to work for the family business, Apex Winery, which she now runs with her husband of 33 years. Rochelle co-founded Chat With Women to change lives and explore possibilities through the power of girl talk.

Rochelle is the mother of two grown sons. Sheâ€™s also a breast cancer survivor and an advocate for Alzheimerâ€™s treatment, sheâ€™s passionate about cooking, hosting and enjoying life, and her motto is â€œLive, Love, Laughâ€”and do it NOW!â€
